title: How successful is Motorola currently in the smartphones arena? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi, thanks for A2A. Motorola has gained a giant success over 5 years. Especially, after it is acquired by Lenovo, it faced or experienced a great success in the market. World wide, Motorola has huge popularity, and to speak statistically, according to January 2019, it retains around 2.72% share world wide. In india Motorola has consistently maintained around 3.5 % or above for the past 1 year. Even though, Motorola is not coming into the top five category, they are enjoying success because it's consistent level of share. There is no drastic drop or rise in its share. Recently, Motorola announced that it has sold over 70 million smartphones of Moto G series only for the past five years. It should be celebrated and obviously G series is the main success factor for Motorola.
